section.title: Muting Tracks
section.para: A track can be muted by clicking on the m button in the &TRACK_CONTROLS; or the mute button in a tracks &MIXER_STRIP;. Muting a track will silence its output, right-clicking on a mute button will bring up a pop-up menu that will allow you to choose what will be affected when muting.

note.para: Muting an Audio Track may slightly reduce the amount of DSP resources required for the session but the audio data referenced by the tracks &PLAYLIST; will still be read from disk.
